ygData.subject: Re: new alliance members
ygData.msgSnippet: Nighteyes screams, but is hit in the leg. She transforms and rushes to the protection of the island. Craken arrives at the Allience Island, and begins to fire

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Nighteyes screams, but is hit in the leg. She transforms and rushes to 
the protection of the island.

       Craken arrives at the Allience Island, and begins to fire his dual 
chain guns at the base, knowing he wouldnt do damage but this was just the 
beginning of the plan.

       Tarantulas rerouted power to the shields. "Send the autogun fire, from 
behinde the shields, at the arriving enemies." He said to Klash.
       She responded and did so. The autoguns, from behinde the shields, 
opened fire on the newly arriving bots.

       Bezerker saw Craken arrive at the Allience base, and scenting Hell 
Beast on him, began to join the attack on the base.

--part1_e2.10a8254e.27c46dfe_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
